[Help maintain the server Fermi relies on](https://github.com/spacebarchat/server)

[Read the blog](https://blog.fermi.chat/)

devSettings.badUser: Enable logging of bad user objects that send too much information:
devSettings.cache: Enable Service Worker Caching map files:
devSettings.cacheDesc: map files will still load either way, this'll just make sure they're in cache when a new update rolls out.
devSettings.captureTrace: This setting tells Fermi to capture _trace properties from the server, enabling this may cause progressive JSON decoding to not work (might require a reload)
devSettings.description: These are for developers of Spacebar/Fermi, if you don't know what you're doing, please don't mess with these settings.
devSettings.logGateway: Log received gateway events (log level info):
devSettings.name: Developer Settings

incorrectURLS:
## This instance has likely sent the incorrect links.
### If you're the instance owner please see [here](https://docs.spacebar.chat/setup/server/) under *Connecting from remote machines* to correct the issue.
 Would you like Fermi to automatically try to fix this error to let you connect to the instance?

interactions.nonsence: The server sent a component of type $1 which does not exist
interactions.notImpl: Fermi has not implemented component type $1 yet
interactions.onlyYou: Only you can see this message

invite.noAccount: Create an account to accept the invite

localuser.2faCodeGive: Your TOTP secret is: $1. This will generate a 6 digits 2FA token with a 30 second expiration period.
localuser.VoiceWarning: Are you sure you want to enable this? It's very experimental and is likely to cause issues. (this feature is for devs, please don't enable if you don't know what you're doing)
localuser.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure you want to delete your account? If so enter the phrase $1
localuser.confirmAddBot: Are you sure you want to add a bot to this application? There's no going back.
localuser.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset the bot token? Your bot will stop working until you update it.
localuser.confuseNoBot: For some reason, this application doesn't have a bot (yet).
localuser.customStatusWarn: Spacebar does not support custom status being displayed at this time so while it'll accept the status, it will not do anything with it
localuser.disableConnection: This connection has been disabled server-side
localuser.installDesc: Installing Fermi will allow you to open it in its own window and act like its own app! You can also just continue to use Fermi in the web browser like you have been and it'll work the same.
localuser.mustTypePhrase: To delete your account you must type the phrase
localuser.noToken: Don't know token so can't save it to localStorage, sorry
localuser.requireCode: Require code grant to invite the bot?
localuser.setUp2faInstruction: Copy this secret into your TOTP (time-based one time password) app to generate your 2FA login codes
localuser.sillyDeleteConfirmPhrase: Shrek is love, Shrek is life
localuser.soundTooLarge: The sound you tried to upload was too large, try again
localuser.trustedDesc: When you click on links sending you to these domain, you will ***not*** be prompted for permission to open like other links, only give this to domains you trust, such as 'https://fermi.chat'

noMessages: No messages here yet, be the first to say something!
noPins: There's nothing for you here... yet
noStickers: That's unfortunate, there are no stickers for you to use!

descriptions.ADMINISTRATOR: Gives ALL permissions below to role members, BYPASSES ALL permission overwrites. This is a DANGEROUS permission!!
descriptions.MANAGE_GUILD: Allows role members to manage and edit the guild.
descriptions.VIEW_AUDIT_LOG: Allows role members to view the audit log.
descriptions.VIEW_CREATOR_MONETIZATION_ANALYTICS: Allows for viewing role subscription insights.
descriptions.VIEW_GUILD_INSIGHTS: Allows role members to see guild insights.
descriptions.BYPASS_SLOWMODE: Slowmode no longer effects role members.
descriptions.MANAGE_NICKNAMES: Allows role members to change nicknames of other members.
descriptions.PIN_MESSAGES: Allows role members to pin messages.
descriptions.SEND_POLLS: Allows role members to send polls.
descriptions.MANAGE_MESSAGES: Allows role members to delete messages that aren't their own.
descriptions.MANAGE_THREADS: Allows role members to delete and archive threads and view all private threads.
descriptions.MANAGE_CHANNELS: Allows role members to edit/delete channels.
descriptions.MANAGE_ROLES: Allows role members to edit/delete roles.
descriptions.MANAGE_WEBHOOKS: Allows role members to edit/delete webhooks.
descriptions.CREATE_EVENTS: Allows role members to create scheduled events.
descriptions.MANAGE_EVENTS: Allows user to edit/delete events (existing and future).
descriptions.CREATE_GUILD_EXPRESSIONS: Allows role members to create expressions (emojis, stickers and soundboard sounds).
descriptions.MANAGE_GUILD_EXPRESSIONS: Allows user to edit/delete expressions (emojis, stickers and soundboard sounds).
descriptions.MODERATE_MEMBERS: Allows role members to timeout guild members (prevent them from sending or reacting to messages in chat/threads and from speaking in voice/stage channels).
descriptions.KICK_MEMBERS: Allows role members to kick members from the guild.
descriptions.BAN_MEMBERS: Allows role members to ban members from the guild.
descriptions.MOVE_MEMBERS: Allows role members to move members between voice channels.
descriptions.MUTE_MEMBERS: Allows role members to mute other members in voice channels.
descriptions.DEAFEN_MEMBERS: Allows role members to deafen other members in voice channels (deafening a member will automatically mute them as well).
descriptions.CHANGE_NICKNAME: Allows role members to change their own nickname.
descriptions.VIEW_CHANNEL: Allows role members to view text channels.
descriptions.READ_MESSAGE_HISTORY: Allows role members to read the message history of text channels.
descriptions.ADD_REACTIONS: Allows role members to add reactions to messages in text channels.
descriptions.SEND_MESSAGES: Allows role members to send messages in text channels.
descriptions.SEND_MESSAGES_IN_THREADS: Allows role members to send messages in threads.
descriptions.SEND_TTS_MESSAGES: Allows role members to send text-to-speech messages in text channels.
descriptions.USE_EXTERNAL_EMOJIS: Allows role members to use external emojis in text channels.
descriptions.USE_EXTERNAL_STICKERS: Allows role members to use external stickers in text channels.
descriptions.EMBED_LINKS: Allow links sent by role members to auto-embed in text channels.
descriptions.ATTACH_FILES: Allows role members to attach files in text channels.
descriptions.SEND_VOICE_MESSAGES: Allows sending voice messages in text channels.
descriptions.CREATE_INSTANT_INVITE: Allows role members to create invites for the guild.
descriptions.CREATE_PUBLIC_THREADS: Allows role members to create public threads.
descriptions.CREATE_PRIVATE_THREADS: Allows role members to create private threads.
descriptions.CONNECT: Allows role members to connect to voice channels.
descriptions.SPEAK: Allows role members to speak in voice channels.
descriptions.USE_VAD: Allows role members to speak in voice channels by simply talking (When disabled, they can only speak using their Push-To-Talk key input).
descriptions.STREAM: Allows role members to stream in voice channels.
descriptions.USE_SOUNDBOARD: Allows role members to use a soundboard in voice channels.
descriptions.USE_EXTERNAL_SOUNDS: Allows role members to use soundboard sounds from other guilds in voice channels.
descriptions.PRIORITY_SPEAKER: Allows for using priority speaker in voice channels.
descriptions.REQUEST_TO_SPEAK: Allows user to request to speak in stage channels.
descriptions.USE_EMBEDDED_ACTIVITIES: Allows role members to use embedded activities.
descriptions.USE_APPLICATION_COMMANDS: Allows role members to use application commands.
descriptions.USE_EXTERNAL_APPS: Allows role members to have application responses to show publicly in channel (When disabled, users will still be allowed to use their apps but responses will be visible only to themselves. This only applies to apps not also installed to the guild).
